title: Major homicide: Six dead found in tower
name: Major homicide: Six dead found in tower
description:
A Map by Vancouversun

This map details known information about the reported slaying of at least six people whose bodies were discovered Oct. 19 at the Balmoral Tower in Whalley, British Columbia, a neighbourhood in Surrey, B.C.

properties.name: Balmoral Tower: Six bodies found here
properties.description: Posted by Vancouversun9830 WHALLEY RING ROAD, Surrey, B.C.This is Balmoral Tower at 9830 Whalley Ring Road, Surrey. Six bodies were found Friday, Oct. 19 in an apartment on the 15th floor. Police said they were homicide victims and had been there for some time.

properties.name: Days Inn: Locked down for hours
properties.description: Posted by VancouversunÂ 9850 King George Highway, Surrey, B.C.This Days Inn a short distance from Balmoral Tower was locked down for about three hours on Friday afternoon during the police investigation.

properties.name: King George Skytrain Station: Commuters turned away
properties.description: Posted by VancouversunKing George and Fraser Highway, surrey, b.c.Massive traffic disruption in the area of Balmoral Tower on Friday evening included the closure of this important transit point, which is the terminus of the Skytrain system\'s Expo line. Roads and highways in the areas were also affected.
